"A.P.241/4/2": "Regarding Mother Cluster, it's something that not even the Intelligence Unit could find any details on."
"That's why your information is so essential, Hitsugi."
"Don't get your hopes up so high, I barely know anything."
"I've never even heard of admins, nor apostles."
"The only reason why I join Mother Cluster is because I received a message from Mother one day, and was introduced into a membership for a social media service."
"I had my doubts at first but- Mother's words were always right, and eventually, I was able to enter directly into PSO2..."
"Slowly, I began to trust Mother's words. I admired that she practically knew everything."
"The only other members I knew were those in my Student Council... and Kohri."
"In the end, that's all I know. I don't know anything beyond that."
"I was under the impression that I knew. Albeit I never changed, I acted as if I had."
"Even though I never gained anything, I believed that I had gained something."
"1. That's the same for everyone."
"2. It's more fun to not know."
"Just like <%me> said, accept what you don't know, and strive hard to understand it. That mindset is more important than anything."
"I've also heard those words before. It's more interesting to not know, I think."
"Big sis... Is it that bad to not know something?"
"Then, I'm the worst of them all. I don't know anything about myself, nor the things around me... Because I don't know..."
"It's alright, Hitsugi. We're all in the same situation, aren't we?"
"It's never to late to start. Let's work hard to learn all kinds of things together."
"...Okay."
